SYSTEM: Ontologies%26Multilinguality.pdf: Página 5
©Guadalupe Aguado de Cea
5
Slide 5
Ontology Localization
•
Localization involves taking a product and making it linguistically 
and culturally appropriate to the target locale (country/region and 
language) where it will be used and sold (LISA)
•
In economics: adapting a product to a non-native environment.
•
In software y web design: adapting contents, language, and design 
to the target language and culture
•
In ontologies: Ontology Localization involves the process of 
adapting an ontology to a particular language and culture.
speaker: SYSTEM
